trans-unit.source: PID for poiCollections: Define a storage pid where to store records of type Point of Interest.
Category root UID: If you're working in an environments with a lot of categories defined, it may make sense to reduce the category tree within our Events2 Plugins to this root Category.
x months in past: When creating a new recurring event this extension can create related day records for the last x months.
x months in future: When creating a new recurring event this extension can create related day records for the next x months.

Default country: If you're only working for one specified country while creating/editing POIs in backend it would be cool to set a country by default. So you only need to add street and city to find a POI. If you need POIs from all over the world, please keep this field empty
XML Import Validator Path (xsd): While Importing Events we will check the XML file against a XSD file. If you need some specials you can define your own file here.
Is organizer required: By default it is not needed to explicit set an organizer. But, if you want, you can set organizer as a required property with activating this checkbox
Is location required: By default it is not needed to explicit set a location. But, if you want, you can set location as a required property with activating this checkbox
email from address: The senders email address. If not given the extension tries to get one from INSTALL_TOOL.
email from name: The senders email name. If not given the extension tries to get one from INSTALL_TOOL.
email to address: The recipients email address.
email to name: The recipients email name.
